definition: making or having a sound as specified, the act of measuring depth of water (usually with a sounding line)
details:
adjective
- making or having a sound as specified
- having volume or deepness
= example: having volume or deepness
- appearing to be as specified
= synonyms: looking
noun
- the act of measuring depth of water (usually with a sounding line)
- a measure of the depth of water taken with a sounding line
